entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
